search_information.query_displayed: Control and Differentiation in the Structure of American Education. McPartland, James M. McDill, Edward L. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Control and differentiation in the structure of American education
organic_results.snippet: The report by Coleman, Hoffer and Kilgore on public and private schools is criticized for failing to consider alternative explanations of school effectiveness and for drawing narrow policy implications. We use student body composition to account for public and private school effectiveness as an alternative to the explanation of external constraints on school authorities implied by" Public and Private Schools." We also emphasize the need to consider school admissions practices, which are overlooked in" Public and Private Schools," in …
